description:
Happy New Year!  Keroro makes a special meal to celebrate the new year, but he may have picked the ingredients poorly, because Mois goes really strange after eating it.  Or, like, super danger?  And then Keroro forgets to do his homework...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Donaré ! Je veux dire bonne année ! / Des devoirs en retard
Moa Teiuka Kingashinnen? de Arimasu / Keroro Osechi mo Ii kedo Shukudai mo ne de Arimasu
モア ていうか謹賀新年? であります / ケロロ おせちもいいけど宿題もね であります
